attributes.action: Replace  God Save the Queen with a far more relevant national anthem.
attributes.background: Jeremy Corbyn has illustrated the fact that our national anthem is no longer relevant to the British people. The uninspiring tune and  lyrics- calling for god to save the queen are divisive and irrelevant  in a country that has such a wide range of views on  the monarchy and religion in general.

rejection.details:
I'm sorry - we cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/108656

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
